医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
炎症性肠病与心力衰竭风险略有增加相关根据瑞典卡罗林斯卡医学院在《欧洲心脏杂志》上发表的一项综合登记研究，炎症性肠病 (IBD) 与诊断后 20 年内心力衰竭的风险略有增加相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Inflammatory-bowel-disease-linked-with-slightly-increased-risk-of-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Inflammatory-bowel-disease-linked-with-slightly-increased-risk-of-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3df9940e-eb0b-4547-8f9b-911d46d1bf81 Wed, 22 May 2024 08:53:00 -0400 Inflammatory bowel disease associated with slightly increased risk of heart failure
世卫组织报告强调性传播感染发病率上升以及艾滋病毒和肝炎控制进展不足根据世卫组织的一份新报告，全球艾滋病毒、病毒性肝炎流行和性传播感染 (STI) 继续构成重大公共卫生挑战，每年造成 250 万人死亡 - 实施艾滋病毒、病毒性肝炎和性传播感染全球卫生部门战略，2022-2030。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/WHO-report-highlights-rising-STI-rates-and-insufficient-progress-in-HIV-and-hepatitis-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/WHO-report-highlights-rising-STI-rates-and-insufficient-progress-in-HIV-and-hepatitis-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b615ecaa-eba9-4b7f-8c5c-24db4141ae54 Wed, 22 May 2024 08:22:17 -0400 WHO report highlights rising STI rates and insufficient progress in HIV and hepatitis control
CYTENA 推出革命性的 C.WASH PLUS：微孔板清洗和分配的未来BICO 旗下公司 CYTENA 自豪地宣布推出 C.WASH PLUS，这是一款尖端的微孔板清洗机和分配器。 C.WASH PLUS 专为高通量和自动化而设计，为免疫和细胞检测提供无与伦比的一致性和精确分配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/CYTENA-unveils-revolutionary-CWASH-PLUS-The-future-of-microplate-washing-and-dispensing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/CYTENA-unveils-revolutionary-CWASH-PLUS-The-future-of-microplate-washing-and-dispensing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=806ea21b-34f6-4a9c-9c96-76a33c49c0f2 Wed, 22 May 2024 08:02:00 -0400 CYTENA unveils revolutionary C.WASH PLUS: The future of microplate washing and dispensing
他在游轮上生病了。在他登上救援船之前，他们把账单递给了他。文森特·瓦斯尼和他的未婚妻莎拉·埃伯莱因从未去过大海。他们甚至从未坐过飞机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/He-fell-ill-on-a-cruise-Before-he-boarded-the-rescue-boat-they-handed-him-the-bill。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/He-fell-ill-on-a-cruise-Before-he-boarded-the-rescue-boat-they-handed-him-the-bill。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9067f32c-c268-45b3-adb6-8df543a68777 Wed, 22 May 2024 07:02:56 -0400 He fell ill on a cruise. Before he boarded the rescue boat, they handed him the bill.
加州向冰毒吸食者付费以使其保持清醒在加利福尼亚州内华达山脉崎岖的山麓，街道上没有乱七八糟的针头，毒贩也没有在街角兜售毒品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/California-pays-meth-users-to-get-sober.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/California-pays-meth-users-to-get-sober.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba5d60e6-5c61-464b-81ae-f4772cab18f6 Wed, 22 May 2024 06:59:44 -0400 California pays meth users to get sober
疫苗怀疑论者在麻疹等问题上误导您的 4 种方式麻疹在美国呈上升趋势。根据美国疾病控制与预防中心的数据，今年迄今为止，病例数量约为四年前同期平均病例数量的 17 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/4-ways-vaccine-skeptics-mislead-you-on-measles-and-more.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/4-ways-vaccine-skeptics-mislead-you-on-measles-and-more.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=758be8c3-d28d-40af-a08c-fd8353b6c397 Wed, 22 May 2024 06:57:22 -0400 4 ways vaccine skeptics mislead you on measles and more
超加工食品会让您孩子的心脏面临风险吗？幼儿超加工食品（UPF）消费与心脏代谢危险因素之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Are-ultraprocessed-foods-putting-your-childs-heart-at-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Are-ultraprocessed-foods-putting-your-childs-heart-at-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51e56799-874b-4bbb-b9fd-aa362a1f2682 Wed, 22 May 2024 06:48:00 -0400 Are ultraprocessed foods putting your child's heart at risk?

Aptamer 和 Timser 合作提供世界上首次宫颈癌血液检测Aptamer Group plc（AIM：APTA）是新型 Optimer® 粘合剂的开发商，旨在促进生命科学行业的创新，已与专注于女性健康的制药公司 Timser Group 签署协议，交易价值高达 465,000 英镑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Aptamer-and-Timser-partner-to-deliver-worlde28099s-first-blood-test-for-cervical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Aptamer-and-Timser-partner-to-deliver-worlde28099s-first-blood-test-for-cervical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6508300c-7375-4c55-aa20-b82e51a386bf Wed, 22 May 2024 05:55:00 -0400 Aptamer and Timser partner to deliver world’s first blood test for cervical cancer
Closed Loop Medicine 任命 Paul Johnson 为非执行董事Closed Loop Medicine Ltd. 是一家领先的 TechBio 公司，开发组合处方药和可实现个性化剂量优化的软件治疗产品，今天宣布任命 Paul Johnson 为独立非执行董事。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Closed-Loop-Medicine-appoints-Paul-Johnson-as-Non-Executive-Director.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Closed-Loop-Medicine-appoints-Paul-Johnson-as-Non-Executive-Director.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8eb5b0cc-929b-4d70-b27b-25d5bf1adcee Wed, 22 May 2024 05:27:00 -0400 Closed Loop Medicine appoints Paul Johnson as Non-Executive Director
